esrb.synopsis: This is a point-and-click adventure game in which players assume the role of Larry Laffer on a quest to lose his virginity in the fictional resort city of Lost Wages. Players explore various environments (e.g., bars, convenience stores, bedrooms) and interact with several characters during the central character's pursuit. Presented in a “cartoony” art style, the game includes several instances of mature humor and sexual material/innuendo: there are depictions of blow-up dolls; jokes about condoms; specific lines such as the following: “The lady upstairs is a human petri dish,”“I ride Mr. Wiggles bareback,”“You carefully guide the condom onto your tumescent 'Little Larry,'” and “She certainly has you standing at attention.” A handful of sequences depict the central character having sex with a prostitute (e.g., a black censor bar covers sexual acts, though moaning sounds can be heard). A few scenes depict Larry's exposed buttocks, while one scene depicts a topless female in a hot tub. During the course of the game, players' character can purchase and consume several alcoholic beverages; a handful of scenes involve protracted dialog about drinking.
